name: Project Dora
description:
Project Dora

Fight your way through custom built levels and survive the zombie apocalypse. Have you got what it takes to survive and reach Project Dora?

Features,

Beautifully presented levels
8 Levels in total
Classic 90s retro feel
Multiple choice of weapons
Custom music

System requirements

OS: Windows XP-7-10
Pentium 200 Ghz
10 MB Space HD
32 MB RAM
DirectX 9.0

Project Dora is created by Camagames and is published by RPGVideo and will be priced at $1

www.rpgstudios.co.uk
